title: FFVII - Crisis Core UNDUB FIX-D&T
description:
Final Fantasy VII: Crisis Core USA UNDUB FIX - D&T

-- FIX --
The original release had a lot of video errors, apparently the JP source I used
was extremely unreliable. Sorry for this, I hope you can all get this new copy.

-- Info --
This is an undub of Crisis Core that we threw together. Can&#039;t guarantee that
all the audio replacement is right, as have yet to play through the entire
game. We&#039;re aware "Power Surge" is still in English, it would be too much hassle
to undub those, but other than that, everything should be Japanese. 

-- Group Message --
We hope you guys enjoy the awesome game the way it was meant to be played.
Would like to give thanks to Gnie for his awesome Xpert 2 application, and 
the UMDGen guys for their tool as well. Big thanks goes out to EMINENT for their
pre-launch release of Crisis Core, so we could get this undub out before the
actual game is out.

This release brought to you by Drakia and Tkeil.
